actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Civil Aeronautics Board for fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for the Civil Aeronautics Board of $74,800,000 for fiscal year 1974, $82,280,000 for fiscal year 1975, $90,400,000 for fiscal year 1976, and such sums as Congress may authorize for subsequent fiscal years. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1371)

titles.title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Civil Aeronautics Board for fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.
